item.title: Research Projects
item.description:
1. ARESIBO - Augmented Reality Enriched Situation awareness for Border security (S/C:AdMeS, H2020:833805)
  2. MaTHiSiS - Managing Affective-learning THrough Intelligent atoms and Smart InteractionS (2016: H2020 IA)
  3. ASGARD (2016:H2020 RIA) Analysis System for Gathered Raw Data.
  4. LASIE (2014:IP) Large Scale Information Exploitation of Forensic Data.
  5. ADVISE (285024) Advanced Video Surveillance archives search Engine for security applications.
  6. I-SEARCH (FP7): A Unified Framework for Multimodal Content Search.
  7. BOEMIE (27538): Bootstrapping Ontology Evolution with Multimedia Information Extraction.
  8. ELU (027866): Enhanced Learning Unlimited.
  9. 3DTV IST Project (Network of Excellence): Integrated Three-Dimensional Television - Capture, Transmission, and Display.
  10. ASPIS (IST-1999-12554): An Authentication and Protection Innovative Software System for DVD-ROM and Internet.
  11. HISCORE IST Project: High Speed 3D and Colour Interface to the Real World.
  12. BIOSEC IST Project (2124): Biometrics and Security.
  13. INTERVUSE IST Project (2109): Integrated Radar, Flight Plan and Digital Video Data Fusion for SMGCS.
  14. OTELO IST Project (2112): Mobile Tele-Echography using an Ultra-Light Robot.
  15. P2PEOPLE IST Project: P2P “Common interests” Search Engine and Collaboration Platform.
  16. X-Media (026978) Knowledge Sharing and Reuse Across Media.
  17. PESCADO Personalized Environmental Service Configuration and Delivery Orchestration.
  18. ASSETS (250527) Advanced Search Services and Enhanced Technological Solutions for the European Digital Library.
  19. REVERIE (287723) REal and Virtual Engagement in Realistic Immersive Environments.
  20. E-MUNIS / IST-2001-33037 Electronic Municipal Information Services - Best Practice Transfer and Improvement Project.
  21. ΧΕΙΛΙΟΤΗΛΕΦΩΝΟ (ΓΓΕΤ-ΕΠΕΤ ΙΙ): Σύστημα Εικονοτηλεφώνου για Κωφούς.
  22. Ανάπτυξη Πρωτοποριακού Υπολογιστικού Εργαλείου Υποστήριξης και Αυτοματοποίησης της Μεταφραστικής Διαδικασίας (ΓΓΕΤ-ΠΑΒΕΤ).
